mapper.insert: insert into products(product_name, original_price, discount_price, discount_rate, thumbnail_img, end_date, ctgr_idx, detail_img) values(#{product_name}, #{original_price},#{discount_price}, #{discount_rate}, #{thumbnail_img}, #{end_date}, #{ctgr_idx},#{detail_img})
mapper.update: update products set product_name = #{product_name}, original_price = #{original_price}, discount_price = #{discount_price}, discount_rate = #{discount_rate}, thumbnail_img = #{thumbnail_img}, end_date = #{end_date}, detail_img = #{detail_img}, ctgr_idx=${ctgr_idx} where product_idx = #{product_idx}
